text: 1.10: 1 Ko 15.54-57; Kor 1.26; Hi 2.14; 1 Pi 1.20Ntigem, kha tugen Krais Zisas, ana taagia nza ndi guma ma. Anan kora muumbar ntigem kɨrar hɨgi. Krais Zisas rimgiap, za vhɨzi ŋkasŋka, ana ana vhɨzgiap, ana won buna vhuuen panan, ana mba gumgi gu mbigi ga muuŋgim, mbe zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ, mbe ana kaŋgi.
